description:
Comfortable organic cotton, classic 5-pocket styling, and a modern slim fit make the men's Sustainer Cord Pant the total package.

Made with 98% organic cotton and a pinch of Lycra® Elastane for extra stretch, these cords might just be the most comfortable pants in your wardrobe. Keep it casual with your favorite prAna T-shirt. Or dress it up with oxfords for more formal occasions.

Of course, they made the Sustainer Pant with movement in mind. Which is why they reinforced the rivet details for extra durability. Top it off with the classic convenience of 5-pocket styling, and, did they already mention these are the total package?
name: Prana Sustainer Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
